about_the_game:
Dice Eater is a mystery card game based around supernatural powers where players must use their power to uncover the other player's tricks.

One day in the 1960s, a group of collectors gathers on a luxurious cruise for the mysterious Exchange.

During this Exchange, those gathered engage in a card game littered with supernatural powers and trickery. The winner will get their hands on a special piece of 'staff,' a tool with a mysterious power.

You have decided to infiltrate the exchange with the goal of taking the prize for yourself. If only you knew that the players in this game were each using their own piece of staff to nefarious ends...

[Game Progression]

The game Dice Eater is played using cards, dice, and its own unique set of rules.
As play progresses, know that the only person you can trust is yourself. This is because your opponents are each using tricks based in supernatural powers to try to get the upper hand in the game.

Yet, you're not out of options yourself.
You have the special ability to see through the supernatural abilities your opponents possess.

[Mana Vision]

Whenever one of your opponents uses their supernatural abilities for trickery, they release 'mana.' You have the ability to see this mana, the source of your opponent's powers, with your own Mana Vision ability.

However, if you're too hasty in discovering your opponent's tricks, you may end up disqualifying yourself. Take your time, using both clues and logic to bring these supernatural powers to light.

[Complete your Report]

Play through this Dice Eater game with its cards and dice to complete your report using your research and the comments you get from your opponent. Once you've gathered enough information to make your opponent forfeit, that will be the time to strike using logical deduction.

Use your deduction skills to uncover your opponent's supernatural abilities!
Use your findings about these abilities to turn the tables and win the game!

[Game Streaming Guide]

The Staffer Series is free to stream, regardless of length of stream, as long as the contents don't include the following:

  • Modifying the game code or doctoring of the game contents through reverse engineering, hacking, or other means.

  • Plans to undermine the story of the game by distorting the main storyline or using broadcasting centered around gore or adult themes.

  • Claiming to be an officially sanctioned stream without prior consultation with the dev team.

The following content is not mandatory to include, but would be greatly appreciated:

  • We would be grateful if you could let us know your plans to stream on our official Discord channel.

  • If you could introduce the game information or URL in the introduction of your broadcast, that would be of great help to our team.

  • Official SNS hashtag is #StafferSeries #DiceEater

The following actions are not authorized in any form, not limited to game streaming:

  • Using any of the included contents for AI training.

name: Dice Eater_Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (21H1)
  • Processor: Intel i3 4160, AMD FX 4300, or equivalent CPU
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU supporting DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i3 8100, or AMD Ryzen 1300X, or equivalent CPU
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 1030 or equivalent GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 MB available space
